net.tmachine.gpg.hue
Class HUDList

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              net.tmachine.gpg.hue.HUDList
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.util.EventListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.io.Serializable
public class HUDList
extends javax.swing.JComponent
implements java.awt.event.MouseListener

Useful control that allows the user to hide/show any layer and also to activate / de-activate any layer; also displays name and status of all layers, and shows their paint order

Note: HUD at top of the list is painted first, HUD at bottom is painted last, i.e this class displays a list in "paint order" rather than logical order (which would put the last-painted layer "highest" i.e at the top of the list)

See Also:
Serialized Form
